text: ohu e asalata pæmini avasthavedi “ginnehi sitinna (malayikavaraya) matada, e asala sitinna (musa) matada, imahat bhagyaya laba dena ladi” yayi (deviyange sannidhanayen sabda naga pavasana) lada atara “lokayan siyalla posanaya kara, paripalanaya karana allah itamat parisuddhavantayeki” yayi pavasana ladi
